## Isotope vs Masonry vs Packery

                 Masonry Isotope Packery
Masonry Layouts     x        x       x
no gaps                              x
draggable                            x
filtering                    x
sorting                      x
multiple layout              x


## Combination filters

.a OR .b = .a, .b
.a AND .b = .a.b
